thread.section_title: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ocean County Veterinary Hospital | ocvh.com | 2 of 46
thread.title: Bill
thread.title_full: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital reviewed by Bill

author: Bill
title: Bill
text:
We have been going to OCVH now for over 20 yrs & are going to really miss them when we move this year!
We have brought all our pets there including our chickens & the staff is always kind, sincere, sympathetic & caring to all our animals.
We will miss Dr. Falk the most!
He is such a great man & can handle even the most scared dog like our Bubba was, may he rest in peace <3
The prices are on par with all other vets, the wait time is short & the quality of care is the best, not to mention their times of operation which is really a life savor in an emergency.
I would not hesitate to recommend to anyone!
~Hens & Hounds Haven~
